thread.title: Supreme Court hears case on juvenile life sentences
thread.title_full: Supreme Court hears case on juvenile life sentences

title: Supreme Court hears case on juvenile life sentences
text:
Published By: CBS News: U.S. - Today 
The Supreme Court has already banned mandatory life sentences for juveniles, but now they are reviewing juvenile sentencing again...
